option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?> <?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
<BorderPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml" fx:controller="org.example.p2pfileshare.controller.RootController">
<!-- ================= MENU BAR ================= --> <top> <MenuBar> <menus>
<!-- Menu File --> <Menu text="File"> <items> <MenuItem text="Chọn thư mục chia sẻ..." onAction="#onChooseShareFolder" /> <SeparatorMenuItem /> <MenuItem text="Thoát" onAction="#onExit" /> </items> </Menu>
<!-- Menu Help --> <Menu text="Trợ giúp"> <items> <MenuItem text="Giới thiệu" onAction="#onAbout" /> </items> </Menu>
</menus> </MenuBar> </top>
<!-- ================= TAB PANE ================= --> <center> <TabPane fx:id="mainTabPane"> <tabs>
<!-- TAB PEER --> <Tab text="Peer" closable="false"> <fx:include source="PeerTab.fxml" fx:id="peerTab" /> </Tab>
<!-- TAB SHARE --> <Tab text="Tài liệu chia sẻ" closable="false"> <fx:include source="ShareTab.fxml" fx:id="shareTab" /> </Tab>
<!-- TAB SEARCH --> <Tab text="Tìm kiếm" closable="false"> <fx:include source="SearchTab.fxml" fx:id="searchTab" /> </Tab>
<!-- TAB HISTORY --> <Tab text="Lịch sử tải" closable="false"> <fx:include source="HistoryTab.fxml" fx:id="historyTab" /> </Tab>
</tabs> </TabPane> </center>
<!-- ================= STATUS BAR ================= --> <bottom> <HBox spacing="10" style="-fx-background-color: #eeeeee;"> <padding> <Insets top="5" right="5" bottom="5" left="5" /> </padding> <children> <Label text="Trạng thái:" /> <Label fx:id="globalStatusLabel" text="Sẵn sàng" /> <!-- spacer để đẩy tên người dùng sang phải --> <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" /> <Label text="Người dùng:" /> <Label fx:id="userNameLabel" text="(chưa đặt)" /> </children> </HBox> </bottom>
</BorderPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.*?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.*?> <?import javafx.geometry.Insets?>
<BorderPane xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml" fx:controller="org.example.p2pfileshare.controller.RootController">
<!-- ================= MENU BAR ================= --> <top> <MenuBar> <menus>
<!-- Menu File --> <Menu text="File"> <items> <MenuItem text="Đổi tên..." onAction="#onChangeName" /> <MenuItem text="Chọn thư mục chia sẻ..." onAction="#onChooseShareFolder" /> <SeparatorMenuItem /> <MenuItem text="Thoát" onAction="#onExit" /> </items> </Menu>
<!-- Menu Help --> <Menu text="Trợ giúp"> <items> <MenuItem text="Giới thiệu" onAction="#onAbout" /> </items> </Menu>
</menus> </MenuBar> </top>
<!-- ================= TAB PANE ================= --> <center> <TabPane fx:id="mainTabPane"> <tabs>
<!-- TAB PEER --> <Tab text="Peer" closable="false"> <fx:include source="PeerTab.fxml" fx:id="peerTab" /> </Tab>
<!-- TAB SHARE --> <Tab text="Tài liệu chia sẻ" closable="false"> <fx:include source="ShareTab.fxml" fx:id="shareTab" /> </Tab>
<!-- TAB SEARCH --> <Tab text="Tìm kiếm" closable="false"> <fx:include source="SearchTab.fxml" fx:id="searchTab" /> </Tab>
<!-- TAB HISTORY --> <Tab text="Lịch sử tải" closable="false"> <fx:include source="HistoryTab.fxml" fx:id="historyTab" /> </Tab>
<!-- TAB INCOMING CONNECTIONS --> <Tab text="Kết nối đến" closable="false"> <fx:include source="IncomingConnectionTab.fxml" fx:id="incomingConnectionTab" /> </Tab>
</tabs> </TabPane> </center>
<!-- ================= STATUS BAR ================= --> <bottom> <HBox spacing="10" style="-fx-background-color: #eeeeee;"> <padding> <Insets top="5" right="5" bottom="5" left="5" /> </padding> <children> <Label text="Trạng thái:" /> <Label fx:id="globalStatusLabel" text="Sẵn sàng" /> <!-- spacer để đẩy tên người dùng sang phải --> <Region HBox.hgrow="ALWAYS" /> <Label text="Người dùng:" /> <Label fx:id="userNameLabel" text="(chưa đặt)" /> </children> </HBox> </bottom>
</BorderPane>
